title: kalpakAmbikai uNDu
sahitya:
kalpakAmbikai uNDu karudum varam kanindu tara


anupallavi

  tolbhavap-piNi aghala sukhamuru nalvAzhvaLikka


caraNam    pAnca bhautika uDalai shAshvatam enreNNAmal
padam paNiyum evaraiyum parindAL mayilai tanil
vAncaiyuDan vanda jagan mAtAvai maravAmal
vaanNgi bhaji mOkSa sAmrAjyamum peralAmE
